###Tender Announcement Cancelled
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006859
**Solicitation Number:** W6399-23LK65/A

This tender announcement has been cancelled.

**Notice Details:**

* Tender status: Cancelled
* Reference number: PW-22-01006859
* Solicitation number: W6399-23LK65/A

**Background Information:**

This tender was for a technical / vocational training project. The tendering process was competitive and open to all qualified bidders.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Atlantic Procurement Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada
* United States

**End User:**

* Department of National Defence

**Point of Contact:**

* Austin Sanford
* Phone: None
* Email: [austin.sanford@forces.gc.ca](mailto:austin.sanford@forces.gc.ca)

**Important:**
This tender announcement has been cancelled. No further information will be provided. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the point of contact listed above.
